Summarize the following article in 100 words: "The Benefits of Plant-Centered Eating"
https://www.forksoverknives.com/plant-based-diet-benefits/

"The Benefits of Plant-Centered Eating" highlights the numerous advantages of adopting a plant-based diet. It emphasizes improved health outcomes, such as reduced risk of chronic diseases like heart disease, diabetes, and certain cancers. The article points out the nutritional richness of plant-based foods, offering essential vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants. Additionally, it discusses weight management benefits, as plant-centered diets are typically lower in calories and high in fiber, promoting satiety. The environmental impact of plant-based eating is also noted, with reduced carbon footprint and resource usage. Lastly, it mentions ethical considerations, advocating for compassion towards animals.
